piwikdomain.title: The URL of your Piwik installation
piwikdomain.description: Enter the URL where your Piwik is installed, eg https://piwik.example.com

piwikidsite.title: Piwik Site ID
piwikidsite.description: Enter the ID of the site you want to track the data into. You can retrieve the ID of your site by logging into your Piwik and going to 'Administration => Websites: Manage'.
